description: pnpm install failed due to a missing package: @modelcontextprotocol/cli
root_cause: Typo in the root package.json file. The package name was incorrect.
resolution: Corrected the package name to '@mcp/cli' in the package.json file and ran pnpm install again.
learnings: Always verify package names before running install commands.
When an install fails, carefully read the error message to identify the root cause.
Investigate local packages as a potential source of dependency issues in a monorepo.

description: GET /messages endpoint returned a 'Cannot GET /messages' error.
root_cause: The Node.js server was not restarted after the server.js file was modified.
resolution: Stopped the server with Ctrl+C and restarted it with 'node server.js'.
learnings: When you modify a Node.js server file, you must restart the server for the changes to take effect.
Always provide clear and explicit instructions to the user, especially when it comes to server management.
